name: tar-gz-creator
title: TAR.GZ Archive Creator
description: Create compressed tar.gz archives from files and folders
content:
Overview

This application creates compressed tar.gz archives from files and folders. TAR.GZ is a popular compression format on Unix/Linux systems, combining TAR archiving with GZIP compression for efficient storage and transfer.

Features

  • Create tar.gz archives from single files or directories
  • Display compression statistics and ratios
  • Preserve directory structure and file attributes
  • No external dependencies required (uses Python stdlib)
  • Calculate space savings from compression

Parameters

  • Input Path: Select a file or folder from stash to compress
  • Output File: Specify the name and location for the tar.gz archive

Output

The application creates a compressed tar.gz archive containing all files from the input path. Compression statistics including ratios and space savings are displayed in the job logs.

Use Cases

  • Create compressed backups for Unix/Linux systems
  • Package software distributions
  • Archive project directories with metadata
  • Reduce file sizes for long-term storage
